lyrics.text:
Kau tamaiki, kau tamaiki, mou omi kei maʻa
Teʻeki ‘ilo ‘a e ‘uli, pe ‘ilo kaiha’a:
Pea tu’u ‘ene tohi ‘a homou hingoa,
‘A e koloa kānokato ‘a e ‘Eiki Sihova.

‘Oua e hangē ko e tama ne maumau koloa,
‘O ne foki ki ‘api kuo mole kotoa:
Pea tu’u ‘ene tohi ‘a homou hingoa,
‘A e koloa kānokato ‘a e ‘Eiki Sihova.

Ka ke hange ‘e koe ‘a e ‘uluaki foha,
He ne tō pē ma’ana ‘a e me’a kotoa.
Pea tu’u ‘ene tohi ‘a homou hingoa,
‘A e koloa kānokato ‘a e ‘Eiki Sihova.
